title: City Generator
description: Design vibrant, dynamic cities effortlessly with our City Generator for Unreal Engine. Define city blocks, customize building sizes and heights, place traffic lights, streetlights, and lush greenery with ease.
longDescription:
Unleash your creativity and build sprawling metropolises with our City Generator blueprints for Unreal Engine. Craft diverse cityscapes tailored to your vision by specifying parameters such as city block sizes, variations, and the distribution of low, medium, and high-density regions within buildings. With intuitive controls, effortlessly mold the urban fabric by adjusting the size and layout of each district and designate the location of the tallest structures for striking skylines.

But our tool doesn't stop at mere aesthetics—immerse players in realistic urban environments by incorporating essential infrastructure. Lay down transmission lines along roads, strategically place traffic lights at junctions to regulate flow, and illuminate the streets with customizable streetlights. Enhance the ambiance with verdant greenery as trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle.

What sets our City Generator apart is its adaptability to diverse terrains. Whether your imagination leads you to build upon flat plains or rolling hills, our blueprint seamlessly adjusts, allowing cities to spawn and conform to the natural topography. Embrace the challenge of hilly regions as your urban landscape cascades down slopes and winds through valleys, creating breathtaking vistas and immersive gameplay experiences.

Dive into endless possibilities with our City Generator's advanced features. Choose from five predefined non-rectangular city shapes for unique layouts or unleash your imagination with integrated procedural houses that inject diversity into the architecture. Whether crafting a bustling downtown core or tranquil suburban sprawl, our product empowers you to bring your virtual cities to life.

Take your world-building to new heights by seamlessly integrating multiple cities within a single level. Our blueprint system allows for effortless junction connections between cities, streamlining the process and providing a seamless player experience.

Embark on your urban planning journey today with our City Generator—a powerful toolset for creating immersive, dynamic cities in Unreal Engine, now with the ability to adapt to hilly terrains for even greater realism and creativity.


IMPORTANT NOTE: SOME FEATURES DOESN'T SUPPORT WORLD PARTITION. REFER TO DOCUMENTATION OR VIDEO GUIDE FOR MORE INFORMATION.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Create customizable city blocks with adjustable sizes and variations
  • Define low, medium, and high-height regions within building spawner
  • Incorporate procedural houses for architectural diversity
  • Lay down transmission lines and traffic lights
  • Illuminate streets with customizable streetlights
  • Spawn trees for added ambiance
  • Choose from five predefined non-rectangular city shapes
  • Seamlessly integrate multiple cities within a single level
  • Effortlessly connect cities with a blueprint system
  • Adapt to hilly terrains for realistic city layouts

The project includes:

  • 11 blueprints
  • 3 Maps
  • 30 Materials, 25 Material instances, 1 Collection Parameter
  • 55 Textures with resolutions including, 4096x4096, 2048x2048, 1024x1024, 512x512, 1000x1000, 303x841, 8x8.
  • 6 HDRIs (CCO textures from PolyHaven) - 4 Variation of each texture.
  • 59 Static Meshes (including 4 modular Low Poly style building Meshes and 12 Low Poly style building Prefabs)

Number of Blueprints: 11

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Windows: Yes

Mac: Unknown
